name: 莊惠鈞
objective: This course is designed to help students develop and strengthen their skills in creating clear, unified, and coherent compositions across different styles, including expository, analytical, and argumentative writing. Students will explore various societal and global issues as prompts for their work. This course also incorporates Conceptual Metaphor Theory (CMT) and AI tools to help students adopt thinking patterns commonly used by native speakers so as to enhance their ability to write with clarity, coherence, and rhetorical effectiveness in English.
schedule:
W1-3: Conceptual Metaphors (CMs) & Basic Ideas in Academic Writing
W4-6: CMs for Academic Writing
W7-9: CMs for Expository & Analytical Purposes 

W10: Midterm Exam

W11-12: AI Writing Workshops (CMs Meet AI)
W13-15: CMs & AI for Argumentative Writing
W16-18: Final Projects & Presentations
